description:
Not all winters are created equally. Designed for milder winters, or riders that like to dial-in their own cold weather kit, the Go jacket uses cutting edge materials to seal out the elements. Crafted from GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ WINDSTOPPER® 150, you can face down headwinds knowing they won’t bel able to touch your hard earned warmth. The windproof material has a comfortable stretch, so you can tuck into the drop without even thinking about your jacket

  • GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ WINDSTOPPER® 150 is completely windproof and has a comfortable stretch
  • 3 rear drop-in pockets for a familiar jersey layout
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • Internal cuffs pair well with gloves and keep the wind from creeping in
  • Stretch panel at the wrist for more mobility, great for transitions between drops and aero bars
  • YKK® Vislon® zipper rolls smoothly, even after hours of being peppered with road grit
  • Trim fit stays close to the body while still leaving room to layer
  • Castelli recommends this jacket for 4°-14°C temperatures
name: Castelli Go Jacket - Women's
